data.lyric:
[ti:Homesick]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:Homesick]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Homesick - Kane Brown
[00:05.17]Lyricist：Kane Brown/Brock Berryhill/Matt McGinn/Taylor Phillips
[00:10.34]Composer：Kane Brown/Brock Berryhill/Matt McGinn/Taylor Phillips
[00:15.52]Dancin' in the kitchen
[00:17.69]You singing my favorite songs
[00:20.37]Swinging on the front porch
[00:22.58]Just laughing at the dogs
[00:25.14]Now you swear you love me more
[00:27.55]When you're whispering goodnight
[00:30.32]All those little moments are every reason why
[00:34.62]I'm homesick
[00:37.43]This feeling that I'm feeling
[00:39.55]No we don't quit
[00:42.06]It's like half of me is missing
[00:44.55]Heaven knows it that all I wanna do
[00:49.32]Is be alone with your brown eyes all tangled up
[00:54.84]Just holdin onto you tonight
[00:59.16]Until the morning
[01:02.17]Baby that's the d**n truth
[01:04.68]If home is where the heart is
[01:07.12]Then I'm homesick for you
[01:14.22]Well it says Kane Brown
[01:16.39]On a sign with a line out the door
[01:20.08]Sold out some little town
[01:22.52]I've never been before
[01:24.48]Yeah they're screaming my name
[01:26.94]This is what we dreamed about
[01:29.65]But out here singing about you baby all I thinking about
[01:33.82]Is how I'm homesick
[01:36.94]This feeling that I'm feeling
[01:38.98]No we don't quit
[01:41.51]It's like half of me is missing
[01:43.92]Heaven knows it that all I wanna do
[01:48.66]Is be alone with your brown eyes all tangled up
[01:54.17]Just holdin onto you tonight
[01:58.52]Until the morning
[02:01.62]Baby that's the d**n truth
[02:04.07]If home is where the heart is
[02:06.44]Then I'm homesick for you
[02:12.22]Homesick for you
[02:18.42]Yeah yeah
[02:23.96]I'm homesick
[02:26.37]This feeling that I'm feeling
[02:28.50]No we don't quit
[02:30.98]It's like half of me is missing
[02:33.44]Heaven knows it that all I wanna do
[02:38.05]Is be alone with your brown eyes just tangled up
[02:43.65]Just holdin' onto you tonight
[02:48.04]Until the morning
[02:51.05]Baby that's the d**n truth
[02:53.63]If home is where the heart is
[02:56.07]I'm homesick for you
[03:00.95]I'm homesick for you
[03:07.98]Yeah yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Homesick]
[ar:Kane Brown]
[al:Homesick]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:05.17]//
[00:10.34]//
[00:15.52]在厨房里翩翩起舞
[00:17.69]你唱着我最喜欢的歌
[00:20.37]悠闲自在地坐在门廊前
[00:22.58]看着小狗 嘴角上扬
[00:25.14]你对我发誓 说你会更爱我
[00:27.55]当你在我耳畔轻声道晚安的时候
[00:30.32]和你在一起这些温馨时刻就是原因
[00:34.62]我想家了
[00:37.43]这是我此刻的感受 
[00:39.55]别离我去
[00:42.06]仿佛我丢了魂一样
[00:44.55]上天知道我的心事
[00:49.32]我只想与你独处 融化在你棕色的眼眸里
[00:54.84]今晚只想与你相拥而睡
[00:59.16]直到天明
[01:02.17]宝贝 这是我的真心话
[01:04.68]如果心之所在便是家
[01:07.12]那我愿为你犯上思乡病
[01:14.22]牌上写着Kane Brown
[01:16.39]门外排着长长的队伍
[01:20.08]票全卖光了
[01:22.52]有些小镇我从未去过
[01:24.48]他们尖叫着 呼喊着我的名字
[01:26.94]这是我梦寐以求的场景
[01:29.65]在这里唱起关于你的歌 我脑子里全是你的身影
[01:33.82]这是我想家的原因
[01:36.94]这是我此刻的心情
[01:38.98]别离我去
[01:41.51]仿佛我丢了魂一样
[01:43.92]上天知道我的心事
[01:48.66]我只想与你独处 融化在你棕色的眼眸里
[01:54.17]今晚只想与你相拥而睡
[01:58.52]直到天明
[02:01.62]宝贝 这是我的真心话
[02:04.07]如果心之所在便是家
[02:06.44]那我愿为了你 思乡情切
[02:12.22]为了你 思乡情切
[02:18.42]//
[02:23.96]我想家了
[02:26.37]这是我此刻的心情
[02:28.50]别离我去
[02:30.98]仿佛我丢了魂一样
[02:33.44]上天知道我的心事
[02:38.05]上天知道我的心事
[02:43.65]今晚只想与你相拥而睡
[02:48.04]直到天明
[02:51.05]宝贝 这是我的真心话
[02:53.63]如果心之所在便是家
[02:56.07]我愿为了你 思乡情切
[03:00.95]我愿为了你 思乡情切
[03:07.98]//
